overview: Iron Monkey is a Hong Kong variation of Robin Hood. Corrupt officials of a Chinese village are robbed by a masked bandit known as "Iron Monkey", named after a benevolent deity. When all else fails, the Governor forces a traveling physician into finding the bandit.
cast: Yu Rongguang|Donnie Yen|Jean Wang Ching-Ying|Angie Tsang Sze-Man|Yen Shi-Kwan
